post.description:
Submit visa verification with student ID and either visa share code (UK) or visa document (outside UK).

- If isInUnitedKingdom = false: provide visaDocument file + studentId file

visaShareCode.description: Visa share code (required if isInUnitedKingdom = true)

visaDocument.description: Visa document file (required if isInUnitedKingdom = false)

400.description: Invalid input or missing required files
